about_the_game:
Demonslayer AKA Me offers a fresh take on the cultivation journey, seamlessly blending the sprawling adventures of a mystical immortal world with the fast-paced action of a classic scrolling shooter. Engage in thrilling aerial combat as you command your squads, switching members in real-time to adapt to every challenge that lies ahead.

A Living World of Cultivation

Discover a richly woven cultivation realm, featuring twelve illustrious sects, three grand capitals, twenty-five vibrant towns, and ten mysterious islands. Every location is brimming with untold stories and formidable challenges, awaiting those who dare to explore.

Forge Your Own Path

Craft a cultivator like no other with 32 distinct Spirit Bodies, 10 foundational Spirit Roots, and countless combinations of innate traits and heavenly Destinies. Master the ten elemental arts—Metal, Wood, Water, Fire, Earth, Lightning, Wind, Ice, Light, and Shadow—as you explore over 500 Heart Sutras and Mystical Techniques. Arm yourself with more than 300 legendary Artifacts and Treasures, steadily ascending toward the heights of immortality.

Classic Aerial Combat

Relive the thrill of classic side-scrolling and vertical shooter battles. Whether defending your abode against intruders or engaging in high-stakes duels, each mode challenges your skill, strategy, and reflexes.

The Cultivator's Way of Life

Immerse yourself in a world of boundless cultivation possibilities. Refine elixirs, forge treasures, weave arrange formations, and inscribe powerful talismans. Tend spiritual fields, gather rare resources, and trade your spoils at auctions, in black markets, or in games of chance. Design your personal Immortal Abode, complete with spirit springs, celestial fields, meditation chambers, and alchemy halls—a sanctuary to further your path toward enlightenment.
